definition: generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more

sentences.english: In April 1975, South Vietnam surrendered to the North and Vietnam was reunited.
sentences.chinese: 1975年4月，南越向北越投降，越南统一。

sentences.english: The NVA can fight forever with China backing them.
sentences.chinese: 北越军队在中国的支持下可以永远的战斗下去。

sentences.english: He had joined them because the North Vietnamese spoke French.
sentences.chinese: 他与另三人同来是因为北越人以法语交流。

sentences.english: 1946 - Ho Chi Minh is elected the President of North Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 1946年的今天，胡志明被选为北越的总统。

sentences.english: Sipsongchutai was included as a part of Northern Vietnam under the administration of Ho Chi Minh.
sentences.chinese: 锡朴乌台成为胡志明领导下的北越的一部分。

sentences.english: So Li Xu want you to take part in a party at her home.
sentences.chinese: 因此李北越货币单位你参加在她的一个宴会家。

sentences.english: Operation Rolling Thunder is estimated to have killed 182, 000 North Vietnamese civilians.
sentences.chinese: 滚雷行动也估计导致182000北越平民死亡。

definition: Democratic Republic of Vietnam (aka North Vietnam), a country in Southeast Asia 1945-1976
pinyin: Yue4 nan2 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2
